text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Haaah……

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: … I wish I could have worded what I said during our shopping trip a little better. Haaah… dummy dum-dum.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
(Ryan might have just… been looking for one more push. 
What good am I backing down? Dummy coward.)

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: (… But if I pushed her too much…)

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: … Man, I'm just going in circles. Dummy.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Good morning!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Oh? You're here early, Bono! 
Is that… chocolate?! Can I try it?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
…! Ahaha, of course. Give me a moment and 
I'll get you something to taste-test～

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
So sweeeet, so deliciooouus! 
Bono chocolate really is the best in the world!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
……… Hmm, do you think eating these 
chocolates would cheer Ryan up too?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: …? Ryan?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Well, she looked a little sad when we 
were out shopping the other day.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
… That hair ornament… I'm sure she really 
liked it, so why didn't she buy it?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Mmm～ trying to maintain her image, maybe? 
Remember how there were a few fans around?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: What?! But…!

text_block_list.name: Elementary School Classmate
text_block_list.text: Whaaat? Biko, you still like Carrot Man?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
… No matter what anyone says, you like what you like! 
That should be more important to you than to anyone else!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: … You're right.

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Good work today～!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Phwaah～ We even closed early… 
But I'm even more tired than last time～

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
We had so many customers～☆ 
A lot of fans came by after hearing too, how marvelous!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ryan is going shopping with Ines, so the three of us 
will clean up and prepare for tomorro-… hmm?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: What do you think that girl wants…?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Hmm? Which girl?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
See that girl under the tree? She's been staring at us 
the whole time. Does she want something with the café?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Hmm… All right, I'll go talk to her. 
And put up the closed sign while I'm at it.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Hey, you there. Do you need something from the café?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: …?! S-She ran away?! …Wait!!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Wait, wait, wait, that's way suspicious! 
Running off the moment I call out…!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Wuoooohhh! 
PE-GA-SUS…… DAAAAASH!!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Gotcha! Name yourself, villain! 
If you're up to no good――

text_block_list.name: Black-clad woman
text_block_list.text:
I-I'm sorry, I'm sorry! 
You won't see me again, I swear……

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: ………? Wh-Wha…?
